TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi TreeView extends System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl

summary.span: 代表在樹狀結構 (項目可以展開和摺疊) 中顯示階層式資料的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that displays hierarchical data in a tree structure that has items that can expand and collapse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板） 之物件的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 下圖顯示簡單。The following illustration shows a simple . ![TreeView 圖例](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView 圖例")![TreeView illustration](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustration") 內容都控制項可以包含豐富的內容，例如和控制項。The contents of a are controls that can contain rich content, such as and controls. A可以包含一或多個為其子系的物件。A can contain one or more objects as its descendants. A定義的階層為物件。A is defined as a hierarchy of objects. A可以填入其樹狀結構，藉由繫結至資料來源，並使用物件。A can populate its tree by binding to a data source and using objects. 資料來源的範例包括和物件。Examples of data sources include and objects. 顯示項目數量龐大，可能會造成效能問題。Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues. 請參閱[最佳化效能：控制項](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md) for more information. 若要改善的效能，請參閱[How to:改善 TreeView 的效能](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-improve-the-performance-of-a-treeview.md)。To improve the performance of a , see [How to: Improve the Performance of a TreeView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-improve-the-performance-of-a-treeview.md). 如需詳細資訊控制項，請參閱[TreeView 概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md)。For more information about the control, see the [TreeView Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md). A具有有限的數目的層級。A has a limited number of levels. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## 自訂 TreeView 控制項Customizing the TreeView Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [TreeView 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TreeView Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建立 。The following example shows how to create a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件資料的參數`e`提供包含和。The event data that the parameter `e` provides contains an and a . 設定為之前選取，或設為的項目`null`如果有任何先前選取的項目。The is set to the item that was previously selected, or is set to `null` if there is no previously selected item. 同樣地，設定為新選取的項目，或設為`null`如果不選取任何新的項目。Similarly, the is set to the newly selected item, or is set to `null` if no new item is selected.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectedValue As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SelectedValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得由 的 指定的屬性值。

span.span: Gets the value of the property that is the specified by for the .

value.span: 由 的 指定的屬性值，如果沒有選取的項目則設為 。

span.span: The value of the property that is specified by the for the , or if no item is selected.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定用來判斷的值屬性的路徑屬性。The property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the property. 例如，假設繫結至型別之物件的集合`Employee`，其中包含兩個屬性，稱為`EmployeeName`和`EnployeeNumber`。For example, assume that a is bound to a collection of objects of type `Employee`, which has two properties called `EmployeeName` and `EnployeeNumber`. 您可以使用若要顯示的值`EmployeeName`中並將來`"EmployeeNumber"`有傳回的值`EmployeeNumber`。You can use a to display the value of `EmployeeName` in the and set to `"EmployeeNumber"` to have return the value of `EmployeeNumber`. 屬性是唯讀屬性。The property is a read-only property. 若要變更的值中的選取項目的，使用屬性來存取。To change the value of a selected item in a , use the property to access the . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例所示使用顯示`EmployeeName`並`EmployeeWorkDay`的屬性`Employee`，並設定屬性設`EmployeeNumber`。The following example shows a that uses a to display the `EmployeeName` and `EmployeeWorkDay` properties of an `Employee` and sets the property to the `EmployeeNumber`. 當您選取`EmployeeName`中，則設定為`EmployeeNumber`。When you select an `EmployeeName` in the , the is set to the `EmployeeNumber`. [!code-xaml[TreeViewSelectedValue#SelectedValuePath](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TreeViewSelectedValue/CS/Window1.xaml#selectedvaluepath)]
